languages.text: "Для меня любой житель Империума подозрителен, пока не докажет свою благонадежность".

traits.locale_text: "Для меня любой житель Империума подозрителен, пока не докажет свою благонадежность".

languages.text: "I treat every citizen as suspect until they have proved they can be trusted."
languages.original_text: "Для меня любой житель Империума подозрителен, пока не докажет свою благонадежность".

traits.locale_text: "I treat every citizen as suspect until they have proved they can be trusted."
"I treat every citizen as suspect until they have proved they can be trusted."
"I treat every citizen as suspect until they have proved they can be trusted."
"I treat every citizen as suspect until they have proved they can be trusted."

languages.text: “在我眼里，每位公民都是嫌疑犯，除非他们能证明他们值得信任。”
languages.original_text: "I treat every citizen as suspect until they have proved they can be trusted."

traits.locale_text: “在我眼里，每位公民都是嫌疑犯，除非他们能证明他们值得信任。”

languages.text: «Considero a todos los ciudadanos sospechosos hasta que demuestren que son de fiar».
languages.original_text: "I treat every citizen as suspect until they have proved they can be trusted."

traits.locale_text: «Considero a todos los ciudadanos sospechosos hasta que demuestren que son de fiar».

languages.text: 「潔白が証明されるまでは、全市民を容疑者として扱います」
languages.original_text: "I treat every citizen as suspect until they have proved they can be trusted."

traits.locale_text: 「潔白が証明されるまでは、全市民を容疑者として扱います」

languages.text: « À mes yeux, tous les citoyens sont suspects tant qu'ils n'ont pas prouvé leur bonne foi. »
languages.original_text: "I treat every citizen as suspect until they have proved they can be trusted."

traits.locale_text: « À mes yeux, tous les citoyens sont suspects tant qu'ils n'ont pas prouvé leur bonne foi. »

languages.text: "Mir ist jeder Bürger suspekt, bis er seine Vertrauenswürdigkeit bewiesen hat."
languages.original_text: "I treat every citizen as suspect until they have proved they can be trusted."

traits.locale_text: "Mir ist jeder Bürger suspekt, bis er seine Vertrauenswürdigkeit bewiesen hat."

languages.text: "Güvenilir olduklarını kanıtlayana kadar tüm yurttaşlara şüpheyle yaklaşıyorum."
languages.original_text: "I treat every citizen as suspect until they have proved they can be trusted."

traits.locale_text: "Güvenilir olduklarını kanıtlayana kadar tüm yurttaşlara şüpheyle yaklaşıyorum."
